name: Fairy Quest
description:
2,5D Platformer where you can only jump! Save the fairies from caterpilars, thorny vines and some weird looking plants.

My entry for the Weekly Game Jam (Week 122)

Everything made by me:

-Unity for the game engine

-Blender for modeling and animating

-Bosca Ceoil for the music

-Brfx & ChipTone for the sounds

-And Paint for the Key icon :D

If someone is interested, here's the project on GitHub: https://github.com/Ebediam/YouBetterJump/tree/ohshit
